attributes.action: Stop Foreigners coming here to take unskilled jobs and stop them claiming benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The jobs situation is bad enough in this country and has been made worse by the influx of foreigners coming over here and taking all the unskilled jobs putting people from their own country out of work,but to top it off,if the foreigners can`t get work then they just claim our benefits,i thought we had to contribute by working to get benefits,it seems foreigners don`t,they should be forced to leave the country,
p.s. don`t try and reject this again,everything in it is true and the reason this country has gone under

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
